alert.note: Alert for Sullivan (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 10:17PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Sullivan, southwestern Russell, eastern Scott and southwestern Washington Counties and the City of Bristol through 1215 AM EDT... At 1117 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles northeast of Gate City, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kingsport, Bristol Tn, Bristol Va, Abingdon, Gate City, Weber City, Walnut Hill, Colonial Heights, St. Paul and Nickelsville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
